resources.string: This module hasn\'t been enabled in Xposed Installer!
Enter this settings from Xposed Installer
Disable legacy qq and general sharing

Pretend sharing via Xposed(PsvX)
Xposed modes:
0-Global: ALWAYS* active regardless of package names settings.
1-Whitelist: ONLY* active for packages that are written in package names settings.
2-Blacklist: ONLY* disactive for packages that are written in package names settings.
-1-Disabled: ALWAYS* disactive. You can also deselect this Module in Xposed Installer.

*Note: A restart to opened apps are required, and if you don't know how to do that, restart your phone. System Apps and some apps are always disabled for security reasons.

Package names settings:
You can enter the full package name(eg. com.tencent.tmgp.sgame) or just a part of it(eg. tencent).
Multiple package names are separated via , .(eg. tencent,baidu)

Debug:
Enabling the debug** will cause this module to output ALL startActivity and startActivityForResult(Context,Activity) in Xposed log.
This will cause delays and a huge amount of Xposed logs, so dont enable it when you dont need it.

**A restart to opened apps are required, and if you don't know how to do that, restart your phone. System apps are immune to debug. Xposed mode settings is effective to debug.

This module is open-sourced. The source can be seen at https://github.com/CwithW/PretendSharing_Xposed

Open source project Acknowledgments:
Xposed
repo.xposed.info
XposedAppSettings
https://github.com/rovo89/XposedAppSettings
The AOSP Project
developer.android.com
